definition: primitive multicellular marine animal whose porous body is supported by a fibrous skeletal framework, gather sponges, in the ocean
details:
noun
- primitive multicellular marine animal whose porous body is supported by a fibrous skeletal framework
= synonyms: poriferan, parazoan
- a follower who hangs around a host (without benefit to the host) in hope of gain or advantage
= synonyms: parasite
- someone able to acquire new knowledge and skills rapidly and easily
= example: someone able to acquire new knowledge and skills rapidly and easily
= synonyms: quick study
- a porous mass of interlacing fibers that forms the internal skeleton of various marine animals and usable to absorb water or any porous rubber or cellulose product similarly used
verb
- gather sponges, in the ocean
- wipe with a sponge, so as to clean or moisten
- soak up with a sponge
- erase with a sponge
- ask for and get free
= synonyms: bum, grub, mooch, cadge
